name: ATHIRA EDUTECH FOUNDATION
briefDescription: The main objective is to introduce Technology to people who are not exposed to the world of technology. Mostly, people from rural areas are focused.- Teaching school children about Electronics, Computer programming, Technology, Design.- Giving students a hands-on experience in the art of building.- Expose them to critical thinking and teaching the art of self-learning.- Introduce digitization to village/rural people.At present we have a program called Ignite the focus of which is to ignite the curiosity for technology and self-learning. We have been conducting this program at government rural schools.
